title: HELP
body:
guys when i start a match i get an uknown direct x error i tried updating my graphic card driver and downloading direct x but nothing happened i need help.
Sorry for my bad english its not my first language

replies.body:
This can happen for a few reasons, but most importantly right now make sure that your OS is up to date so it has all necessary products.  You might also have security settings that's preventing files from being access, and giving this error.  Run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure access is being allowed.

Once finished, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a force repatch to make sure there aren't any missing files as well.  I hope that helps!
